title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 13 - Acquisition Of Real Estate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 13 - Acquisition Of Real Estate

State Regulations
§ 13.1 - Amounts included in cost of real estate
§ 13.2 - Rules governing acquisition of land

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. I, pt. 13

Statutory authority: State Finance Law, §
8[14]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
